import React, { useState } from 'react' import { AuthConsumer } from '../helper/AuthContext' import MyModal from '../components/MyModal' function Home() { const [userContact, setUserContact] = useState(undefined) const getUserContact = (userId) => { const users = localStorage.getItem('users') users.forEach((user) => { if (user.uuid === userId) { console.log(user) } }) } return (
{({ user, logout }) => ( <>
Contact List
{/* */} {}
Profile Name Email Phone number
Img Vatsal Patel vatsal@email.com 1111111111
)}
) } export default Home
